A4.text: Sir Hiram Stevens Maxim (5 February 1840 â€“ 24 November 1916) was an American-born British inventor best known as the creator of the first automatic machine gun, the Maxim gun.

A5.text: Maxim was born in Sangerville, Maine on 5 February 1840
